    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:S182_9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>S182_9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Studying mammals: the social climbers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren der Säugetiere: die 
Sozialbergsteiger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudier des mammifères : les grimpeurs 
sociaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudando mamíferos: os climbers sociais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studiare i mammiferi: i climbers sociali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτη των θηλαστικών: οι κοινωνικοί ορειβάτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudiar mamíferos: los trepadores 
sociales</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Monkeys have long fascinated us because of their similarities to the human race. In this unit you will find out about some of the characteristics that make them so like us: their physiology, complex social interactions, large brains and intelligence. This is the ninth unit in the ‘Studying mammals’ series.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Evolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">humans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">mammals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">primates</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fallhammer haben uns lang wegen ihrer 
Ähnlichkeiten zur menschlichen Rasse fasziniert. In dieser 
Maßeinheit finden Sie über einige der Eigenschaften heraus, die sie 
so wie wir bilden: ihre Physiologie, komplizierten 
Sozialinteraktionen, großen Gehirne und Intelligenz. Dieses ist
die 9. Maßeinheit in den?Studying Säugetieren? Serie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les singes nous ont longtemps fascinés en raison
de leurs similitudes à la race humaine. Dans cette unité vous 
découvrirez au sujet de certaines des caractéristiques qui les font 
ainsi comme nous : leur physiologie, interactions sociales 
complexes, grands cerveaux et intelligence. C'est la neuvième 
unité dans les mammifères ?Studying ? série.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os macacos têm-nos fascinado por muito tempo por
causa de suas similaridades à raça humana. Nesta unidade você
encontrará para fora sobre algumas das características que as fazem 
assim como nós: seus physiology, interações sociais 
complexas, cérebros grandes e inteligência. Esta é a nona 
unidade nos mamíferos?Studying? série.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le scimmie lungamente li hanno affascinati a 
causa delle loro somiglianze alla razza umana. In questa unità 
scoprirete circa alcune delle caratteristiche che ce li fanno così: 
loro fisiologia, interazioni sociali complesse, grandi cervelli 
ed intelligenza. Ciò è la nona unità nei mammiferi?Studying? 
serie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι πίθηκοι μας έχουν συναρπάσει από καιρό λόγω των 
ομοιοτήτων τους στην ανθρώπινη φυλή. Σε αυτήν την μονάδα θα
ανακαλύψετε για μερικά από τα χαρακτηριστικά που τους κάνουν 
έτσι όπως μας: η φυσιολογία, οι σύνθετες κοινωνικές 
αλληλεπιδράσεις, οι μεγάλοι εγκέφαλοι και η νοημοσύνη τους. 
Αυτό είναι η ένατη μονάδα στα θηλαστικά ?Studying; 
σειρά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los monos nos han fascinado de largo debido a sus
semejanzas a la raza humana. En esta unidad usted descubrirá 
sobre algunas de las características que las hacen tan como nosotros:
su fisiología, interacciones sociales complejas, cerebros 
grandes e inteligencia. ¿Ésta es la novena unidad en los 
mamíferos?Studying? serie.</string>
          </description>
